column5: He's a neighbor to a few of you.  Earned 31 of 32 first place votes.
And earned every damn vote he got!! Had an amazing year, canadian or not that boy can play ball!!
Would be even better to see him playing here, and we need to replace Overbay!
I hope the Reds keep him happy.  He played single A ball here local and he keeps getting better and better, he works hard at what he does
hi people havent been around for a while, to busy fishing. Go reds, we have season tickets right next to the reds dugout let me know whien you and whopper are planing your next to hit your next  game

Chief, we'll do it for sure.  Whopper and I will meet you at a game and maybe hit the park early for lunch in the Machine Room Grille.  I usually miss the opener, but take in the next 3 or 4 games, then come back in early May before walleye season opens up yonder.  After that I make it when I can.  I'm mystyfied that more from Joey's home area don't show interest in his career.  MVP is no small achievement.
